DOC.detailed_description: This study divide two stage . In first stage , student University Nantes complete two assessment tool gamble related cognition ( GABS : Gambling Attitudes Beliefs Survey ; GRCS : Gambling Related Cognitions Scale ) , reference tool gamble problem severity ( SOGS : South Oaks Gambling Screen ) . In second stage , consecutive pathological gambler seek treatment University Hospital Nantes complete three questionnaire . Only questionnaires participant report gamble least one time past year kept analysis . Responses student gambler pathological gambler present treatment compile analysis . The main objective study validate French adaptation GABS GRCS , explore psychometric property structure . The recruitment period first stage comprise March 2008 August 2008 . The recruitment period second stage start September 2008 .
